Package com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.aircraft

Class GearHelper

java.lang.Object
com.mouseviator.fsuipc.helpers.aircraft.GearHelper
public class GearHelper
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides methods that return data requests to gather various info about aircraft gear.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GearHelper()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    IDataRequest<java.lang.Short> getCenterWheelRPM()

  • Constructor Details

    • GearHelper

      public GearHelper()

  • Method Details

    • getControlLever

      public IntRequest getControlLever()
      Returns data request to get/set gear control. The value returned by this request / or to be set by this request, ranges from 0 to 16383. Where: 0=full up, 16383=full down. Note that the returned object will be READ request by default. To make it write request, call its IDataRequest.setType(com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.IDataRequest.RequestType) method with parameter IDataRequest.RequestType.WRITE.
      Returns:
      Data request to get/set nose gear position.

    • getNosePosition

      public IntRequest getNosePosition()
      Returns data request to get/set nose gear position. The value returned by this request / or to be set by this request, ranges from 0 to 16383. Where: 0=full up, 16383=full down. Note that the returned object will be READ request by default. To make it write request, call its IDataRequest.setType(com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.IDataRequest.RequestType) method with parameter IDataRequest.RequestType.WRITE.
      Returns:
      Data request to get/set nose gear position.

    • getRightPosition

      public IntRequest getRightPosition()
      Returns data request to get/set right gear position. The value returned by this request / or to be set by this request, ranges from 0 to 16383. Where: 0=full up, 16383=full down. Note that the returned object will be READ request by default. To make it write request, call its IDataRequest.setType(com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.IDataRequest.RequestType) method with parameter IDataRequest.RequestType.WRITE.
      Returns:
      Data request to get/set right gear position.

    • getLefttPosition

      public IntRequest getLefttPosition()
      Returns data request to get/set left gear position. The value returned by this request / or to be set by this request, ranges from 0 to 16383. Where: 0=full up, 16383=full down. Note that the returned object will be READ request by default. To make it write request, call its IDataRequest.setType(com.mouseviator.fsuipc.datarequest.IDataRequest.RequestType) method with parameter IDataRequest.RequestType.WRITE.
      Returns:
      Data request to get/set left gear position.
